tweets.text: Working alongside our partners, the fantastic natural #flood risk management scheme at Smithills #Bolton continues to make excellent progress! This week large stone dams have been installed to #slowtheflow & work with the peatland restoration project to enhance our environment https://t.co/NBL4rwIY4d

We started on our next tree planting site in Littleborough with some proper Yorkshire weather of hail and sunshine! The Cloise will have a total of 4225 trees planted for @merseyforest üå± https://t.co/IJNUrf5BnG

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @PHE_EoEngland @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson I am yes! I‚Äôm Supposed to be resting as much as possible after being rushed in at 23 weeks but I can‚Äôt even do that in my own home...I‚Äôm now 26 + 3 and about to see my consultant to see how much further I might make it!

urls.title: Fish Legal v Information Commissioner [2015] UKUT 0052 (AAC) - Landmark Chambers | Barristers Chambers London
urls.description: The Upper Tribunal has recently handed down judgment in Fish Legal v Information Commissioner, determining that privatised water companies are public authorities within the meaning of Article 2(2)(b) of Directive 2003/4/EC on public access to environmental information and Regulation 2(2)(c) of the Environmental Information Regulations 2004. This case is the first consideration by the Upper Tribunal of the guidance given by the CJEU in Fish Legal v Information Commissioner (C-279/12) (an earlier reference

tweets.text: Hi @EnvAgency, there's a burst pipe flowing into the New River, just south of Hornsey High St, London N8. Thames Water say it's a raw water main, not their responsibility. Is this something you can help with? Local birds already struggling to get the pollution off their feathers. https://t.co/sbZohOgdgC

domain.name: Holiday
domain.description: Holidays like Christmas or Halloween

tweets.text: Went in to my garden to do some Easter holiday planting (Westlands). Would be more pleasant to be in a field full of freshly spread manure. Who knows what this is doing to our health? @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL
